description: New boundary wall to Nelmes Road and Herbert Road, new crossover to Nelmes Road and reinstating pavement on two existing crossovers on Nelmes Road
decision_conditions: The proposed development hereby approved shall be constructed in accordance with the materials detailed on drawing no. 20-006/Boundary Wall and colours/finishes shall be as described unless otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.
Reason: To ensure that the appearance of the proposed development will harmonise with the character of the surrounding area.

Before the development hereby permitted commences at the site, an Arboricultural Method Statement (AMS) in accordance with the requirements of BS 5837 (2012) 'Trees in Relation to Design, Demolition and Construction' for all trees located at 23 Nelmes Road shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The protection measures as appoved shall be undertaken at the site before any work in connection with the development hereby permitted commences at the site and shall be retained for the duration of any work at the site, in connection with the development hereby permitted, within the fence or otehr means of enclosure surrounding the trees no activities associated with the building operations shall take place unless previously agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
Reason: In order to maintain the existing vegetation at the sit which makes an important contribution to the character of the area and to accord with Policy 27 of the Council's Loca
